note.p: American physician. BS, Vermont, 1859; MD 1860. Commissioned as surgeon of the Twelfth Massachusetts Volunteers, 1861. Assistant medical purveyor to the regular corps, 1867; chief medical purveyor, 1872; colonel, 1874; surgeon general, 1890.
U.S. Army Office of Medical History: Surgeons General, history.amedd.army.mil/surgeongenerals/J_Baxter.html (accessed 10 February 2015)
